title: Magic of the mountains: summer and autumn
creator_credit: Mushir Ahmad, M. Bhavnani and Documentary Films of India
brief_description: Kashmir, the summer playground of ancient kings and now a holiday resort. Formal Mogul gardens with fountains; flowers; work in papiermache and embroidery; life around the lakes; sports; trips into the mountains; the shepherds; autumn, harvest and fruit picking; the coming of winter.
